DOC.HEADLINE: SCIENCE CALENDAR : OBSERVATORY TRACES LAST YEAR OF COMET
DOC.TEXT: When Comet Shoemaker-Levy crashed into Jupiter in July , it was one of the most-watched astronomical events in modern times . The Griffith Observatory ' s new multimedia planetarium program examines the comet from discovery to its fiery demise . " Comet Crash " examines Comet Shoemaker-Levy from its discovery at Palomar Observatory in 1993 to its spectacular collision with the giant planet , observed by almost every major telescope in the world . The program also evaluates the risk of such an event to Earth and assesses what might be done to avert such a catastrophe . It will run_through Dec . 11 . ( 213 ) 664-1191 .
